name: Quick Meditations (5-10 Minutes)
description: Short, accessible meditation practices for busy lives. Perfect for building a daily habit without overwhelm.

exercises.name: 5-Minute Breath Awareness
exercises.description: Simple focus on breathing - perfect beginner meditation
exercises.instructions: Sit comfortably. Close eyes. Notice your natural breath. When mind wanders, gently return to breath. No judgment, just notice.

exercises.name: Morning Intention Setting (5min)
exercises.description: Start the day with clarity and purpose
exercises.instructions: Sit quietly. Take 3 deep breaths. Ask: What matters most today? What is one thing I can let go of? Sit with whatever arises.

exercises.name: Quick Body Check-In (5min)
exercises.description: Scan body for tension, release what you can
exercises.instructions: Sit or lie down. Breathe naturally. Notice: jaw tension? Shoulders tight? Belly held? Soften each area as you notice it.

exercises.name: Gratitude Practice (5min)
exercises.description: Shift perspective by focusing on what is working
exercises.instructions: Sit comfortably. Bring to mind 3 things you are grateful for today. Can be tiny (warm shower) or big (health). Feel the appreciation.

exercises.name: Walking Meditation (10min)
exercises.description: Mindful movement - perfect for those who struggle sitting still
exercises.instructions: Walk slowly indoors or outdoors. Feel each foot lifting, moving, placing. Notice body movement. When mind wanders, return to sensation of walking.
